headline: Why Rapid7 (RPD) Is Down 23.3% After Cautious Guidance and CFO Appointment Despite Strong Q3
summary: Rapid7 recently reported its third quarter 2025 earnings, highlighting revenue of US$217.96 million and new AI-driven product capabilities, while also announcing Rafe Brown as the incoming Chief Financial Officer effective in December. Despite exceeding revenue expectations and unveiling innovations, including an expanded Microsoft partnership, analyst sentiment has turned more cautious due to softer future guidance and increased pressure from industry competition. With Rapid7's leadership...

headline: IREN (NasdaqGS:IREN) Valuation in Focus Following $9.7 Billion Microsoft AI Cloud Deal
summary: IREN (NasdaqGS:IREN) just inked a $9.7 billion, multi-year cloud services deal with Microsoft, drawing fresh attention from investors. This agreement places IREN at the center of hyperscale AI cloud infrastructure and marks a significant step in its transformation strategy. See our latest analysis for IREN. Recent excitement around IREN has sent its share price up a remarkable 496.37% year-to-date, powered by its Microsoft mega-deal and accelerating AI cloud strategy. Momentum has clearly...

headline: Investing.com’s stocks of the week
summary: Investing.com – U.S. equities were extremely volatile this week, as investor concerns regarding valuations led to declines, especially among technology stocks. However, there were some names that managed to make solid gains.
